input_args.instruction: "Context: {'diffuse large B-cell lymphoma': {'variants': ['rs116446171', 'rs79480871', 'rs2523607', 'rs13255292', 'rs4733601'], 'genes': ['HLA-B']}, 'marginal zone lymphoma': {'variants': ['rs9461741', 'rs1364229', 'rs16947122', 'rs2922994'], 'genes': ['BTNL2']}}\nQuestion: Out of the given list, which Gene is associated with diffuse large B-cell lymphoma and marginal zone lymphoma.
